data.title: Clear Aligners
data.meta_description: You'll wear each set of aligners for about two weeks... As you advance through the aligner series, your teeth will gradually shift.
data.text:
Your treatment plan kicks off with a consultation with an experienced Invisalign provider. During this session, you and your doctor discuss the treatment options suitable for your particular issue. Once confirmed that Invisalign is the right fit for your needs, your doctor creates a detailed treatment plan outlining how each set of aligners will progress.

Upon starting your treatment, you'll wear each set of aligners for approximately two weeks. These custom-made aligners gently guide your teeth into the desired position. At the end of each two-week period, you transition to the next set of aligners, progressing through the series.

As you advance through the aligner series, your teeth will gradually shift, offering visible changes to your smile. Positive transformations may even become apparent early in the process, allowing you to witness the impact of Invisalign on your smile.

Regular checkup appointments, often scheduled every six weeks, allow your doctor to monitor your progress. These check-ins are crucial to ensuring your treatment stays on track, and adjustments can be made as needed.

You don't have to wait until the completion of your treatment to see results. Invisalign may start delivering positive changes early on, contributing to the excitement of your smile transformation

Before scheduling your initial consultation, consider taking a self-assessment to determine if Invisalign aligners align with your goals. Bring the results to your consultation to facilitate a more informed discussion with your Invisalign provider.
